channel.title: SoundPhile.ca
channel.itunes:subtitle: Unsigned Artists
channel.itunes:author: SoundPhile.ca
channel.itunes:summary: We search high and low to find the best in indie music, and then deliver what we find to you in a single podcast each week. No more endless searching countless indie music sites for good artists!
channel.description: We search high and low to find the best in indie music, and then deliver what we find to you in a single podcast each week. No more endless searching countless indie music sites for good artists!

item.title: May 27th, 2012
item.description: This week we bring to you another 5 very talented artists from across the globe. Yasmina, Dora Nadine, Oceans Divide, Memory Of A Melody, and Ephesar! Don't miss out!
item.itunes:author: SoundPhile.ca
item.itunes:subtitle: May 27th, 2012 Podcast.
item.itunes:summary: This week we bring to you another 5 very talented artists from across the globe. Yasmina, Dora Nadine, Oceans Divide, Memory Of A Melody, and Ephesar! Don't miss out!
item.itunes:keywords: good, indie, music, unsigned, yasmina, dora nadine, oceans divide, memory of a melody, ephesar, sound phile, soundphile, sound, file

item.title: May 20th, 2012
item.description: This week we bring to you 5 very talented artists from across the globe. No Sleep For Lucy, Lovers & Liars, Melia, Come To Dolly, and Warning Birds! Don't miss out!
item.itunes:author: SoundPhile.ca
item.itunes:subtitle: Our very first weekly podcast.
